item.title: Note for DQB
item.author: miracle_l@bupt.edu.cn (Ayamir)
item.description: 整体概况 Link：Modeling the Perceptual Quality for Viewport-Adaptive Omnidirectional Video Streaming Considering Dynamic Quality Boundary Artifact Level：IEEE TCSVT 2021 DQB: Dynamic Quality Boundary，指在基于分块的 FoV 自适应全景视频推
